name: SignaturePad.Root
description: A component that allows users to draw a signature using a signature pad.
description_zh: A component that allows users to draw a signature using a signature pad.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

disabled.description: Whether the signature pad is disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 签名板是否处于禁用状态。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the signature pad elements. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 签名板元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

name.description: The name of the signature pad. Useful for form submission.
name.description_zh: 签名板的名称。用于表单提交。

readOnly.description: Whether the signature pad is read-only.

required.description: Whether the signature pad is required.

translations.description: The translations of the signature pad. Useful for internationalization.
translations.description_zh: 签名板的翻译。对国际化很有用。
